evs.external.fewsadapter
Class EVSToFEWSAdapter

java.lang.Object
  evs.external.fewsadapter.EVSToFEWSAdapter

public class EVSToFEWSAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the connection between the Flood Early Warning System (FEWS) and the EVS. The FEWS invokes the main method of this class. The diagnostics from the EVS are written to XML for display in the CHPS output dialog.

Version:
2.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com, xiaoshen.li@noaa.gov
